description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Figure 8 Racing (F8R) is a casual racing experience which encourages vehicle contact in order to gain the advantage. With up to 4-player split screen, multiple tracks, customisable options and mini-games F8R offers something for everyone.
